page.title: 17FARMING IN NETHERBURY
page.content: Within the block there are: l beef farm, 2 fruit farms, mainly apple, l arable farm, wheat/barley, 2 sheep farms, l4 dairy farms. The area consists mainly of dairy farming, due to good grass, and the fields are small and often hilly, so not cost effective for arable farming with large tractors. Some dairy farms also fatten beef calves. Out of a total of 20 farms, 14 are mainly dairy and one is a large beef unit. There is one arable farm in the north centre of the block where hedgerows have been removed and larger fields made, where wheat and barley are grown. Most of the farms are owner or tenant occupied. There are also 2 small sheep farms where sheep run on the hill fields. There are 2 large fruit farms growing apples, pears and soft fruit.
